CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1957, pg. 14 reads: "Glamour...Glamour...was in evidence during the tournament play and here are four examples. Left: Zeline Richard, physical ed instructor from Detroit, wore pedal pushers for comfort..."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Zeline Richard posed in Fort Pitt Hotel for 24th annual American Bridge Association tournament
